thread.section_title: Radiocodes отзывы | Отзывы клиентов о Radiocodes | radiocodes.ru
thread.title: walterete

author: walterete
title: walterete
text:
At the begining I felt insecure, since I dont really trust internet sites for purchasing, but in this case everything worked perfectly, i put all the data in a page in russian language which i did not understand at all , and they answer me by email in english, i paid with my credit card by paypall, and they gave the radio code in a few hours, Im very happy with my purchase, thank yo all the team!
W.At the begining I felt insecure, since I dont really trust internet sites for purchasing, but in this case everything worked perfectly, i put all the data in a page in russian language which i did not understand at all , and they answer me by email in english, i paid with my credit card by paypall, and they gave the radio code in a few hours, Im very happy with my purchase, thank yo all the team!
W.
